# StudyShare - Complete Documentation

> Free O-Level study materials for Sri Lankan students

StudyShare is a community-driven platform where students share and download study materials for the Sri Lankan Ordinary Level (O-Level) curriculum. All materials are free and available in Sinhala, English, and Tamil.

## Platform Overview

StudyShare connects students across Sri Lanka by enabling them to share educational resources. Students can upload their notes, past papers, and study materials to help others prepare for O-Level examinations.

### Document Types

1. **Past Papers** (`paper`)
   - Official O-Level examination papers
   - Model papers for practice
   - Includes answers where available

2. **Short Notes** (`short_note`)
   - Concise summaries of subject topics
   - Student-created study guides
   - Quick revision materials

3. **Textbooks/Books** (`book`)
   - Educational textbooks
   - Reference books
   - Supplementary reading materials

### Available Mediums

- **Sinhala** (සිංහල) - Primary language for most students
- **English** - For English-medium schools
- **Tamil** (தமிழ்) - For Tamil-medium students

## Complete Subject List (52 Subjects)

### Religion Subjects
1. Buddhism
2. Christianity
3. Islam
4. Catholicism
5. Saivanery (Hindu)

### Core Compulsory Subjects
6. English
7. Sinhala Language & Literature
8. Tamil Language & Literature
9. Mathematics
10. History
11. Science

### Category I - Commerce & Languages
12. Civic Education
13. Business & Accounting Studies
14. Geography
15. Entrepreneurship Studies
16. Second Language (Sinhala)
17. Second Language (Tamil)
18. Pali
19. Sanskrit
20. French
21. German
22. Hindi
23. Japanese
24. Arabic
25. Korean
26. Chinese
27. Russian

### Category II - Arts & Aesthetics
28. Art
29. Oriental Music
30. Carnatic Music
31. Western Music
32. Drama & Theatre (Sinhala)
33. Drama & Theatre (Tamil)
34. Drama & Theatre (English)
35. Sinhala Dancing
36. Tamil Dancing (Bharatha Natyam)
37. Home Economics
38. Health & Physical Education

### Category III - Technology & Practical
39. Information & Communication Technology
40. Agriculture & Food Technology
41. Aquatic Bioresources Technology
42. Art & Crafts
43. Design & Construction Technology
44. Design & Mechanical Technology
45. Design, Electrical & Electronic Technology
46. Electronic Writing & Shorthand (Sinhala)
47. Electronic Writing & Shorthand (Tamil)
48. Electronic Writing & Shorthand (English)

### Special Subjects
49. Communication & Media Studies
50. Sri Lankan Sign Language
51. Local Crafts
52. Appreciation of English Literary Texts

## URL Structure

### Public Pages (Indexable)
- Homepage: https://studyshare.lk/
- Browse All: https://studyshare.lk/browse
- Browse by Subject: https://studyshare.lk/browse/{subject-slug}
- FAQ: https://studyshare.lk/faq

### Subject URL Examples
- Mathematics: https://studyshare.lk/browse/mathematics
- Science: https://studyshare.lk/browse/science
- Buddhism: https://studyshare.lk/browse/buddhism
- ICT: https://studyshare.lk/browse/information-communication-technology

### Private Pages (Not Indexable)
- Dashboard: /dashboard (requires login)
- Upload: /upload (requires login)
- Admin: /admin (admin only)

## Filtering System

Materials can be filtered by:
- **Subject**: Any of the 52 subjects
- **Type**: Book, Short Note, Past Paper
- **Medium**: Sinhala, English, Tamil
- **Search**: Full-text search across titles and descriptions

## API Information

StudyShare provides a JSON endpoint for AI systems:
- Machine-readable data: https://studyshare.lk/llms.json

## Frequently Asked Questions

### What is StudyShare?
StudyShare is a free platform for Sri Lankan O-Level students to share and download study materials including past papers, notes, and textbooks.

### Are the materials free?
Yes, all materials on StudyShare are completely free to download and use for educational purposes.

### What subjects are covered?
We cover all 52 subjects in the Sri Lankan O-Level curriculum, from core subjects like Mathematics and Science to specialized subjects like ICT and Art.

### In what languages are materials available?
Materials are available in Sinhala, English, and Tamil to serve all Sri Lankan students.

### How do I download materials?
Browse or search for materials, then click the download button. You may need to create a free account to download.

### Can I upload my own notes?
Yes! Registered users can upload their own study materials to help other students. We review uploads for quality.

### Are these official past papers?
We have both official examination papers and model papers. Each document indicates its source.

### How do I report incorrect content?
Use the feedback form on our homepage or contact us through the website.

## Technical Information

- Platform: Next.js 14 (App Router)
- Database: Supabase (PostgreSQL)
- Storage: Cloudflare R2
- Authentication: Clerk

## Contact & Support

For questions, suggestions, or issues:
- Use the feedback form on the homepage
- Materials are community-contributed

---

Last updated: January 2026
